Name: Sharkboo
Desc: Seen in the distant seas and the seafood section of the fresh food market.

1.Name: Drylands Shark Hunt
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Plants a homing trap underfoot which bites, tears, and summons torpedos at triggering enemies, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Cold Surge
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

2.Name: Cold Surge
2.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are 2 or more <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 125% more Anomaly Buildup.

1.Name: Relentless Pursuit
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Summons a homing trap and leaps toward the target, causing an explosion upon landing that deals <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> and accumulates massive <color=#98EFF0>Ice Anomaly Buildup</color>.
